name: I Am Two People
description:
A strange and interesting visual novel, about 3 hours long.

Strange Story
"I" have two bodies: Niu Tianci is very disciplined and good at learning; Murong Egg likes freedom. Under the disguise of "I", no one knows that Xueba and the gangster are the same person. When Niu Tianci studies, Murong Dun needs to help with trivial matters; Murong Dun is in trouble and needs to be solved by heaven.
However, the growth process of young people is full of contradictions: academic pressure, emotional ignorance, desire to understand but more lost, and inner struggle... How will "I" get along with myself?

Narrative Style
"I" need to control the two bodies on both sides of the screen to do things and talk. The inner monologue will appear at the bottom of the screen, and sometimes it needs to complete interaction and small games.
The story is set in a small town in China more than ten years ago, which recreates the campus life of that year. The plot is clear and neat, the dialogue is humorous, the plot animation is ingenious, and each link strives to be interesting.
The absurd setting hides the theme that touches people's hearts: man and self. Will you reconcile with yourself when you return to your childhood?

The Role of Setting
The characters in the story are also strange and interesting. The contrast between the two bodies is very obvious: heaven sent, serious, but low EQ; Murong Dun is free and lax, and neglects his work. They will love and kill each other under the control of monologue.
Other characters also have their own plots. For example: Zhang Kuang is a bohemian gangster, whose only concern is brotherhood; Teacher Ren pursues the first place, but his true character is gradually exposed when he is challenged by bad students

Every character is a master of playing peduncle.

Small Game
The process includes about 10 different mini games and other smaller interactions. They are all unique narrative methods, serving the plot.
These games are fast paced, not difficult, and full of fun.
*When you want to play truant and go to Internet cafes, you need to pass a horizontal version of the adventure game,
*When you are chased by your head teacher in the corridor, you will be converted to Parkour game,
*When you throw chalk at your classmates in the classroom, you will enter the shooting game

Voice
All tens of thousands of words of lines are dubbed and recorded by the latest AI. In order to provide a better sense of immersion. Each character has a distinctive voice.
Please note that each sentence has been manually adjusted as much as possible, but AI sometimes cannot accurately express emotions. Students who are not suitable can turn off dubbing in the options.

* This game needs to read a lot of text, not the battle system.
* This game contains swear words, underage rebellion, mental illness and more.
